Text saved: Graffiti is when people write or draw on walls in public places. Street art is art that people make in public places, like on streets.

What do people in the art world think about it? Now, many people think it is a real type of art. There were big art shows in Paris, London and Los Angeles. People could see street art in special art places called galleries.

Elura Emerald is an American artist. In 2008, she made a street art show in New York. She said good things about street artists. She said they just want to show their ideas. They do not hurt anyone. She said people should like their art.
